resources.string: The app come from an app named Jike APP in China,which has a group [Is today Friday?](You can visit it from the button at bottom-left.)
The logo of this app come from a text style of Jike APP, and the picture is generated from a website created by a Jiker.
Main color: white(#F8F8F8)/blue(#01A9F4)/yellow(#FFE411)/black(#404040) was get from Jike website.
526 kinds of color in [more color] were got from a website named [中国色](the colors of China),you can visit it below.The color values at this website comes from a paper：《色谱》中科院科技情报编委会名词室.科学出版社,1957.
Chinese fonts：ShuSong、FangSong、KaiTi、HeiTi，are free fonts by FangZheng font library.
English fonts: AmaticSC/Courgette/IndieFlower/Kalam/Laila/Molle /NovaFlat/PermanentMarker/PlayfairDisplay/Teko/YanoneKaffeesatz(by order), are all free fonts by google fonts website.
Enter a six-bit or eight-bit color value start with #
Go to target app, you can select qrcode in album to donate.
You don\'t have %1$s installed on your phone so you can\'t donate, thanks for your support.
Long click qrcode to save in album.
The app need storage permission to read and save pictures.
